subject: p15131736
History: Year old woman s/p ventral hernia repair now s/p extubation , interval change interval change.
Impression: Compared to chest radiographs through. Severe cardiomegaly and very large pulmonary arteries are chronic. Lungs are grossly clear. No appreciable pleural effusion. Right PIC line ends in the low SVC. Esophageal drainage tube passes into the stomach and out of view.
